product_name: SportHill Sprint Tank Top - Men's - 2013 Special Buy
long_description: With high-performance fabric that actually makes you feel cooler, plus mesh panels for ventilation, the SportHill Sprint tank will help you feel your best during your warm-weather workouts. Polyester body features CoolTouch(TM) Grid fibers that are engineered to make you feel 1 - 2 degrees cooler immediately upon contact; fabric wicks moisture and dries fast. Polyester/spandex mesh panels on the sides provide great breathability. Shoulder seams are shifted to the front to minimize friction and abrasion. Reflective logos on the front and back increase your visibility at night. The SportHill Sprint tank top is shaped for a slim fit; hem hits high on the hips. Special buy.
short_description: With high-performance fabric that actually makes you feel cooler, plus mesh panels for ventilation, the SportHill Sprint tank will help you feel your best during your warm-weather workouts.
